    Returns a currency code (ISO 4217 Alpha-3) associated to the specified country code (ISO 3166 Alpha-2).

    Returns the currency custom string, based on the specified locale.

    Returns the name of the entity associated to the currency, based on the specified locale, denomination (short or official) and title style.
    boolean currencyExists​(java.lang.String licenseKey, java.lang.String currency, boolean activeOnly)
    Returns a Boolean value indicating whether the currency is included in the list of active currencies or of all currencies.
    long currencyFeeds​(java.lang.String licenseKey, java.lang.String currency)
    Returns the number of FX feeds providing exchange rate data for the currency.
    long currencyHits​(java.lang.String licenseKey, java.lang.String currency)
    Returns the number of times this currency has been referenced by a COM object or by the Web service.
    boolean currencyLegalTender​(java.lang.String licenseKey, java.lang.String currency)
    Returns a Boolean value indicating whether the currency is legal tender.
    java.lang.String currencyName​(java.lang.String licenseKey, java.lang.String currency, java.lang.String locale, boolean titleStyle)
    Returns the extended name of the currency, based on the specified locale and title style.
    boolean currencyPhysical​(java.lang.String licenseKey, java.lang.String currency)
    Returns a Boolean value indicating whether the currency is a physical currency.
    long currencyPopularity​(java.lang.String licenseKey, java.lang.String currency)
    Returns the currency popularity value (1 = high, 2 = medium, 3 = low).
    java.lang.String currencyRegime​(java.lang.String licenseKey, java.lang.String currency)
    Returns the identifier of a regime or monetary union, or an empty string.
    java.lang.String currencySmallestUnit​(java.lang.String licenseKey, java.lang.String currency)
    Returns the smallest unit for the currency.

    Returns the subunit name, based on the specified locale, inflection (singular or plural) and title style.
    java.lang.String currencySymbol​(java.lang.String licenseKey, java.lang.String currency, java.lang.String locale)
    Returns the currency symbol, based on the specified locale.
    java.lang.Object currencyToCountry​(java.lang.String licenseKey, java.lang.String currency, CurncsrvReturnCountry returnCountry)
    Returns a country code (ISO 3166 Alpha-2) associated to the specified currency (ISO 4217 Alpha-3).
    java.lang.String currencyToDomain​(java.lang.String licenseKey, java.lang.String currency)
    Returns a domain suffix (IANA TLD) associated to the specified currency code (ISO 4217 Alpha-3).
    java.lang.Object currencyToLocale​(java.lang.String licenseKey, java.lang.String currency, CurncsrvReturnLocale returnLocale)
    Returns a locale identifier (Windows LCID or RFC 4646) associated to the specified currency code (ISO 4217 Alpha-3).
    boolean currencyTriangulation​(java.lang.String licenseKey, java.lang.String currency)
    Returns a Boolean value indicating whether the currency is a subunit of BaseUnit at a constant rate.
    java.lang.String currencyUnit​(java.lang.String licenseKey, java.lang.String currency, java.lang.String locale, CurncsrvUnitInflection inflection, boolean titleStyle)
    Returns the unit name, based on the specified locale, inflection (singular or plural) and title style.
    boolean currencyWarning​(java.lang.String licenseKey, java.lang.String currency)
    Returns a Boolean value indicating whether the currency has been referenced by a recent warning condition.
    java.lang.String domainToCurrency​(java.lang.String licenseKey, java.lang.String domain, boolean activeOnly)
    Returns a currency code (ISO 4217 Alpha-3) associated to the specified domain name (string ending with IANA TLD).
    java.lang.String export​(java.lang.String licenseKey, java.lang.String format, java.lang.String encoding, java.lang.String baseCurrency, java.lang.String locale, java.lang.String flags, java.lang.String serviceLicenseKey, java.lang.String serviceExpirationTime, java.lang.String serviceRenewalURL, java.lang.String errorCode, java.lang.String errorMessage, java.lang.String time, java.lang.String type)
    Returns a string with information on the active currencies in the specified format.

    • convert

      public java.lang.Object convert​(java.lang.String licenseKey, java.lang.String fromCurrency, java.lang.String toCurrency, double amount, boolean rounding, java.lang.String format, CurncsrvReturnRate returnRate, java.lang.String time, java.lang.String type) throws java.rmi.RemoteException
      Description copied from interface: CurrencyServerSoap
      Converts a currency amount. The result is either a number or a string which can optionally be rounded and formatted. When a string is returned, either fromCurrency or toCurrency (but not both) may contain a list of semicolon-separated active currencies. Leave the time and type parameters empty for forward compatibility.
      Specified by:
      convert in interface CurrencyServerSoap
      Throws:
      java.rmi.RemoteException
